text: Futhi khumbulani ngesikhathi senza isivumelwano nabantwana bakwa-Israyeli ukuthi ningakhonzi (lutho olunye) ngaphandle kokukhonza uMvelinqangi, futhi kubazali nenze okuhle nasezihlotsheni nasezintandaneni nakwabampofu, futhi nikhulume nabantu inkulumo enhle futhi nenze umthandazo ninikele kwabampofu (zakaah) nibe ngabaphendukela emuva ngaphandle kwabambalwa benu futhi nina naniqembukelane
